channel.title: Anti-syi pker
channel.description:
Hi I've got my code for 1 user per ip and here it is [code] for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null && !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect", connectedFrom)){ sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected = true; return; } }[/code]
But im havin the trouble where to put the code lool can you please tell me where i put it
Thanks

item.title: Anti-syi pker

item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Hi I’ve got my code for 1 user per ip and here it is

for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null && !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect", connectedFrom)){ sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected = true; return; } }
